subject: How to test a method that logs to a file
msgSnippet: Hi I would like to know how to JUnit test a method that writes logs to a file. I am using log4j and I have methods that write different logs to a file. How do
messageBody:
Hi

I would like to know how to JUnit test a method that writes logs to a
file. I am using log4j and I have methods that write different logs to
a file. How do I Junit test that these methods are working fine.

Regards
Hemanth
